channel.title: Dicing Help

item.title: Dicing Help
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

[quote=“Camballer, post:1, topic:477730”]Ok just a quick question how would I make dicing donators only in this code [quote]case 15096: rnd = Misc.random(19)+1; Message = (“rolled <col=16711680>”+ rnd +" on a twenty-sided die."); break;
case 15094: rnd = Misc.random(11)+1; Message = (“rolled <col=16711680>”+ rnd +" on a twelve-sided die."); break;
case 15092: rnd = Misc.random(9)+1; Message = (“rolled <col=16711680>”+ rnd +" on a ten-sided die."); break;
case 15090: rnd = Misc.random(7)+1; Message = (“rolled <col=16711680>”+ rnd +" on an eight-sided die."); break;
case 15100: rnd = Misc.random(3)+1; Message = (“rolled <col=16711680>”+ rnd +" on a four-sided die."); break;
case 15086: rnd = Misc.random(5)+1; Message = (“rolled <col=16711680>”+ rnd +" on a six-sided die."); break;
case 15088: rnd = Misc.random(11)+1; Message = (“rolled <col=16711680>”+ rnd +" on two six-sided dice."); break;
case 15098: rnd = Misc.random(99)+1; Message = (“rolled <col=16711680>”+ rnd +" on the percentile dice."); break;[/quote] And I have one more question, how can I make it so that when you kill someone in the wildy you’re rewarded with 3m cash , like it just goes in your inv[/quote]
For the dicing thing just add if (c.isDonator == 1) { after case #:

Read full topic

item.title: Dicing Help
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

Ok just a quick question how would I make dicing donators only in this code

case 15096: rnd = Misc.random(19)+1; Message = (“rolled <col=16711680>”+ rnd +" on a twenty-sided die."); break;
case 15094: rnd = Misc.random(11)+1; Message = (“rolled <col=16711680>”+ rnd +" on a twelve-sided die."); break;
case 15092: rnd = Misc.random(9)+1; Message = (“rolled <col=16711680>”+ rnd +" on a ten-sided die."); break;
case 15090: rnd = Misc.random(7)+1; Message = (“rolled <col=16711680>”+ rnd +" on an eight-sided die."); break;
case 15100: rnd = Misc.random(3)+1; Message = (“rolled <col=16711680>”+ rnd +" on a four-sided die."); break;
case 15086: rnd = Misc.random(5)+1; Message = (“rolled <col=16711680>”+ rnd +" on a six-sided die."); break;
case 15088: rnd = Misc.random(11)+1; Message = (“rolled <col=16711680>”+ rnd +" on two six-sided dice."); break;
case 15098: rnd = Misc.random(99)+1; Message = (“rolled <col=16711680>”+ rnd +" on the percentile dice."); break;
And I have one more question, how can I make it so that when you kill someone in the wildy you’re rewarded with 3m cash , like it just goes in your inv

Read full topic
